import React ,{ useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from "axios" import Bar from './Bar'; import "../css/basket.min.css" const Basket = props => { const [countries, setCountries] = useState([]); const [load, setLoad] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { axios.get('https://restcountries.eu/rest/v2/all') .then(res => { setCountries(res.data); setLoad(true); }) .catch(err => { setError(err.message); setLoad(true) }) }, []); return (
